feed.title: AIQ
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive and feature-rich Jekyll theme for technical writing.

entry.title: Developing the Future of Energy: A Global AI Pioneer

link.title: Developing the Future of Energy: A Global AI Pioneer

entry.summary: AIQ is a digital pioneer based in Abu Dhabi that is committed to using data to propel AI-powered change in the energy sector, bringing about a more sustainable future. As a joint venture between the multinational energy giant ADNOC and the UAE's leading AI company G42, AIQ is developing cutting-edge AI and machine learning solutions that create value along the w...

what is jekyll Pre-requisites to install Installation process Get started with sample posts More referecing sites
What is Jekyll
Simple, blog-aware, static site generator Jekyll is ideal for individual, project, or organization websites. Jekyll converts HTML and Markdown files into a fully static website based on the layouts you select. Markdown ...
